original_text: Again, I looked and I saw a large paper. It was moving through the air. There were many words on the paper.
korean_text: 내가 다시 눈을 들어 본즉 날아가는 두루마리가 있더라

sentences.original_text: and I saw a large paper
It was moving through the air
There were many words on the paper
sentences.korean_translation: 그 종이 위에 많은 글자가 있었다
